#长度为8的RKmul中间参考结果
A = [3,5,9,23,4,6,8,13]
B = [34,67,87,4,67,3,8,45]
check(SBMul(A,B),RKMul(A,B))

Step1 Asum: [7, 11, 17, 36]
Step1 Bsum: [101, 70, 95, 49]
Step3: [102, 371, 902, 1832, 2076, 1623, -494, -1123, -373, -464, -585, 0]
Step4: [102, 371, 902, 1832, 1974, 1252, -1396, -2955, -2449, -2087, -91, 1123, 373, 464, 585, 0]
Step5: [102, 371, 902, 1832, 2681, 2853, 1756, 3259, 2225, 2166, 1673, 1123, 373, 464, 585, 0]



#长度为8的OFKmul中间参考结果
A = [3,5,9,23,4,6,8,13]
B = [34,67,87,4,67,3,8,45]
check(SBMul(A,B),OFKMul(A,B))

Step1 Asum: [8, 32, 10, 21]
Step1 Bsum: [101, 91, 70, 53]
Step3: [371, 1832, 2853, 3259, 2166, 1123, 464, 0]
Step4: [102, 902, 2681, 1756, 2225, 1673, 373, 585]
Step5: [102, 371, 902, 1832, 2681, 2853, 1756, 3259, 2225, 2166, 1673, 1123, 373, 464, 585, 0]

#长度为16的RKmul中间参考结果
A = [3,5,9,23,4,6,8,13,34,54,23,5,2,45,67,8]
B = [34,67,87,4,67,3,8,45,23,4,5,78,9,23,4,56]
check(SBMul(A,B),RKMul(A,B))

Step1 Asum: [37, 59, 32, 28, 6, 51, 75, 21]
Step1 Bsum: [57, 71, 92, 82, 76, 26, 12, 101]
Step1 Asum: [7, 11, 17, 36]
Step1 Bsum: [101, 70, 95, 49]
Step3: [102, 371, 902, 1832, 2076, 1623, -494, -1123, -373, -464, -585, 0]
Step4: [102, 371, 902, 1832, 1974, 1252, -1396, -2955, -2449, -2087, -91, 1123, 373, 464, 585, 0]
Step5: [102, 371, 902, 1832, 2681, 2853, 1756, 3259, 2225, 2166, 1673, 1123, 373, 464, 585, 0]

Step1 Bsum: [32, 27, 9, 134]
Step3: [782, 1378, 915, 3129, 4329, 1368, -1256, -1905, -2972, -3784, -448, 0]

Step5: [782, 1378, 915, 3129, 4699, 4130, 3706, 3527, 7126, 7025, 2550, 1905, 2972, 3784, 448, 0]

Step3: [2109, 5990, 9417, 12330, 9314, 1168, -4802, -4764, -6597, -7827, -2121, 0]

#长度为16的OFKmul中间参考结果
A = [3,5,9,23,4,6,8,13,34,54,23,5,2,45,67,8]
B = [34,67,87,4,67,3,8,45,23,4,5,78,9,23,4,56]
check(SBMul(A,B),OFKMul(A,B))

Step1 Asum: [8, 32, 10, 21, 88, 28, 47, 75]
Step1 Bsum: [101, 91, 70, 53, 27, 83, 32, 60]
Step1 Asum: [12, 12, 57, 69]
Step1 Bsum: [121, 75, 28, 13]
Step3: [567, 1247, 4530, 4562, 5292, 1894, 611, 0]
Step4: [102, 1120, 2261, 4575, 7041, 1035, 445, 268]
Step5: [102, 567, 1120, 1247, 2261, 4530, 4575, 4562, 7041, 5292, 1035, 1894, 445, 611, 268, 0]
Step1 Asum: [28, 19, 59, 53]
Step1 Bsum: [71, 48, 82, 79]
Step3: [1561, 1189, 1342, 4490, 6916, 6681, 2704, 0]
Step4: [335, 509, 4743, 5715, 3048, 2900, 1939, 448]
Step5: [335, 1561, 509, 1189, 4743, 1342, 5715, 4490, 3048, 6916, 2900, 6681, 1939, 2704, 448, 0]
Step1 Asum: [40, 31, 116, 122]
Step1 Bsum: [192, 123, 110, 92]
Step3: [3960, 5695, 14364, 21377, 17073, 12102, 5220, 0]
Step4: [808, 4482, 13411, 17750, 17958, 11644, 9409, 4500]
Step5: [808, 3960, 4482, 5695, 13411, 14364, 17750, 21377, 17958, 17073, 11644, 12102, 9409, 5220, 4500, 0]
Step3: [371, 1832, 2853, 3259, 6407, 8492, 7460, 12325, 7869, 4865, 7709, 3527, 7025, 1905, 3784, 0]
Step4: [102, 902, 2681, 1756, 3450, 9273, 5917, 10277, 11531, 8340, 7951, 4794, 7126, 2550, 2972, 448]
Step5: [102, 371, 902, 1832, 2681, 2853, 1756, 3259, 3450, 6407, 9273, 8492, 5917, 7460, 10277, 12325, 11531, 7869, 8340, 4865, 7951, 7709, 4794, 3527, 7126, 7025, 2550, 1905, 2972, 3784, 448, 0]
